txt.en:
'While the cooks who make hard tack ply their trade, I oversee the creation of the foods that help to speed the process of carrying and collecting all the materials we need to craft the hard tack.

'There are very tasty fish swimming in a pond within this cavern. With a little spice they can become a hearty dish or two for those helping in the creation of hard tack.

'Collect some and deliver them to the fish barrels.'
Deliver the deep fish to a barrel of fish
You caught ten fish from the pond in the cavern. You should deliver those to a fish barrel near the cooks making dishes to help those helping to make hard tack.
Cooks making dishes to help the creation of the hard tack need fish to make the heartiest dishes and snacks. Fish them up at the pond in the cavern.
Hard Tack Event: Barrel of Fish
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
Deliver the fish to a fish barrel
Collect fish for the cooks helping the community ([placeholder]/5)
Fish up the tasty fish in the pond in the cavern.
